content: Hi, I am a DPhil student at the university of Oxford, that would be helpful if I could meet someone(maybe a fellow PhD student) in Oxford or London to pick up some basics. Thanks so much
@Fatimah(Rita) Ahmadi Welcome! There's quite a large crowd in London.
Can you say a bit more about your background? Maths or CS? Have you already done some tutorials?
None, physics, but know some math, interested in category theory, yes I followed some tutorials but need to talk to someone.
Imperial works for me! Maybe if someone is free sometime over lunch!

Hi @Fatimah(Rita) Ahmadi ! I'm a postdoc at Imperial, working on formalizing some algebraic number theory. I'm not familiar with the category theory part of mathlib, but I would be happy to talk about Lean at some point. Maybe one Thursday after the London Learning Lean seminar? Feel free to PM me, and welcome!
